# sprite Demos

## Inline Palette Definition

Sprites can define colors inline without a separate palette.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "sprite", "name": "heart", "palette": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{r}": "#FF0000", "{p}": "#FF6B6B"}, "size": [4, 4], "regions": {"_": {"points": [[0,0],[3,0],[0,3],[3,3]]}, "r": {"points": [[1,0],[2,0],[0,1],[1,1],[2,1],[3,1],[1,2],[2,2]]}, "p": {"points": [[0,2],[3,2],[1,3],[2,3]]}}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="inline_palette">
</div>

## Origin Point

Sprites can define an origin point for positioning and rotation.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_colors", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player", "palette": "player_colors", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"_": {"points": [[0,0],[4,0],[0,3],[4,3]]}, "s": {"points": [[1,0],[2,0],[3,0],[1,1],[2,1],[3,1]]}, "h": {"points": [[1,2],[2,2],[3,2]]}, "c": {"points": [[1,3],[2,3],[3,3]]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3], "boxes": {"hurt": {"x": 0, "y": 0, "w": 5, "h": 4}, "hit": {"x": 1, "y": 1, "w": 3, "h": 2}}, "attach_in": [2, 0], "attach_out": [2, 4]}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="origin">
</div>

## Collision Boxes

Named collision/hitbox regions for game logic.

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_colors", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player", "palette": "player_colors", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"_": {"points": [[0,0],[4,0],[0,3],[4,3]]}, "s": {"points": [[1,0],[2,0],[3,0],[1,1],[2,1],[3,1]]}, "h": {"points": [[1,2],[2,2],[3,2]]}, "c": {"points": [[1,3],[2,3],[3,3]]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3], "boxes": {"hurt": {"x": 0, "y": 0, "w": 5, "h": 4}, "hit": {"x": 1, "y": 1, "w": 3, "h": 2}}, "attach_in": [2, 0], "attach_out": [2, 4]}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="collision">
</div>

## Attachment Points

Points for connecting sprites in chains (arms, chains, etc.).

<div class="demo-source">

```jsonl
{"type": "palette", "name": "player_colors", "colors": {"{_}": "#00000000", "{s}": "#F5D0C5", "{h}": "#8B4513", "{c}": "#0066CC"}}
{"type": "sprite", "name": "player", "palette": "player_colors", "size": [5, 4], "regions": {"_": {"points": [[0,0],[4,0],[0,3],[4,3]]}, "s": {"points": [[1,0],[2,0],[3,0],[1,1],[2,1],[3,1]]}, "h": {"points": [[1,2],[2,2],[3,2]]}, "c": {"points": [[1,3],[2,3],[3,3]]}}, "metadata": {"origin": [2, 3], "boxes": {"hurt": {"x": 0, "y": 0, "w": 5, "h": 4}, "hit": {"x": 1, "y": 1, "w": 3, "h": 2}}, "attach_in": [2, 0], "attach_out": [2, 4]}}
```

</div>

<div class="demo-container" data-demo="attachments">
</div>
